page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Employment in the area relies on the petroleum and chemical industries. Work is for such companies as Esso, Re-Chem, etc. Esso Refinery at Fawley is the largest in Europe. Many people in our assigned area work in these industries.
There is quite a low unemployment rate in this area mainly because of Esso. As this is a forest area there are a few jobs arising from this. Forestry work is quite common and many people apply for vacancies in this field.
Many people travel to Southampton or further to their place of work. In a big town such as Southampton there are many job opportunities because it is always developing.
